com.gemalto.mfs.mwsdk.payment

Interface PaymentServiceListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ContactlessPaymentServiceListener, QRCodePaymentServiceListener, RemotePaymentServiceListener

    public interface PaymentServiceListener
    Common listener for the payment transaction.

    • Method Detail

      • onAuthenticationRequired

        void onAuthenticationRequired(PaymentService activatedPaymentService,
                              CHVerificationMethod cvm,
                              long cvmResetTimeout)
        This method is called when the card has been successfully updated. Upon receipt of this call-back, the Library User needs to check the cvm value to see what verification method is required. The Library User needs to
        • Acquire the currently activated PaymentService from PaymentBusinessService.getActivatedPaymentService(). On the interface of the PaymentService, the Library User can get the appropriate verifier object for the requested CHVerificationMethod and display accordingly to the End User for input of the credentials.
        • : Also, after the End User has input the credentials, the credentials shall time out (wiped away for security reason) after a period (the duration is in the parameter cvmResetTimeout). The Library User may want to show a count down clock and listen to this event by registering through PaymentService.setCVMResetTimeoutListener(CVMResetTimeoutListener).
        Parameters:
        activatedPaymentService - PaymentService
        cvm - CHVerificationMethod
        cvmResetTimeout - Timeout duration after the CH has been verified in seconds.

      • onError

        void onError(SDKError<PaymentServiceErrorCode> paymentServiceErrorCodeSDKError)
        It is called, where there is any known or unknown error occured to use the service.
        Parameters:
        paymentServiceErrorCodeSDKError - Error codes for Payment Service operations to indicate an error that happened
